== Where can I view my purchases and my payment history? ==

To view your payment history, go to https://pay.ubuntu.com/payment/ .  Copies of your receipts are available here, in case you no longer have the email sent after purchase.

To view your Software Center purchases, go to https://software-center.ubuntu.com/subscriptions/ .  This site also includes details about your private package archives (PPAs), for downloading the software manually.
